import React from 'react'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Container'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import { Store } from '../Store'; import { useContext } from 'react'; import ListGroupItem from 'react-bootstrap/esm/ListGroupItem'; import ListGroup from 'react-bootstrap/ListGroup'; import { Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import axios from 'axios' function Total_price(total , item) { return total + (item.price*item.quantity) } function handleClick() { try { const result = axios.post('/api/placeorder') } catch(err) { } } export default function PreviewOrder() { const {state , dispatch} = useContext(Store) return (
